amongus.headline: 'AMONG US' breaks world record for being CRINGE
amongus.subtitle: Video game under fire for being called 'Cringe' by 'Ali-A'
amongus.author: Kotcheru Kinglson
body: New online murder mystery game came under fire for being called 'Cringe' by YouTuber 'Ali-A'. Alexander Alexander, also known by his Twatch and YoseTube name Ali-a, recently made a video where he played through the game Among Us, a multiplayer battle royal, and concluded that the Indian game is, in fact, 'cringe'.
> I just think that it's a lil stinky, sort of cringe, innit.
He said on stream. Many viewers were enraged by his comment on the game, and decided to not donate their salary through subs.

boughtpalace.headline: How one man BOUGHT Buckingham Palace
boughtpalace.subtitle: This charming individual has BOUGHT the castle of royalty in BRITAIN!
boughtpalace.author: Sir Reginald Fancybottom Esq.
body: BuckingHam Palace, AKA ~*~*~*~*ingHam Palace, is the home of the Queen of Bri{color:#AAA}[t]ain and her many friends. As a national symbol of Big Castle, it is of course off the property market, for the most part, but local man known as Lawrence Hylda purchased this big house for just under $103. But how did he do it, you ask. We asked him in this exclusive interview
# FreshTrust Journalist Sir Reginald Fancybottom Esq.
# Lawrence Hylda, new legal owner of the Royal Family
> So how did you buy the Palace?

> Idk man, it was on <https://amazon.com>[www.Amazon.com], the best place to by anything from books to shoes, and I was looking at the great deals they had for buttons, and I saw BuckingHam Palace listed for $102 and 58 cents.
> Huh. I wonder what that was doing there on that website, which by the way, is a really great place to buy headphones
> Are you going to keep explaining how you bought it?
And that is how you buy the Palace. <https://amazon.com>[Click here for great deals and low prices]

catoven.headline: How many CATS can one fit in an OVEN?
catoven.subtitle: We ask this everyday... but now we FIND OUT!
catoven.alt: Household cat on a household oven
catoven.author: Djungelskog
body: How many household cats can fit in a household oven? We ask this question to ourselves everyday. It has never been solved by any living person at any time in history. But now! With the help! Of! Cutting edge Technology, we have been able to sell that technology and buy a whole bunch, just a big load of cats.

This was said by the Chief Experiment Scientist Delora Mlakar here at FreshTrust Labs (Child company to FreshTrust News). We agree with her. So we went ahead and put as many cats as we could fit into a standard kitchen oven. Standard Robert said this in response:
> You would not believe the results!
And here is the results: /We forgorðŸ’€/
